title: Bat Form
data: {{version028}} {{flavour|You have been transformed into a swift-moving bat, increasing your evasion but substantially weakening your melee attacks. Any equipped weapons, armour and rings are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill.}} [[File:Bat form.png]] '''Bat Form''' is a [[Vampire]] [[ability]] and a [[bad form]] which turns the player into a small and agile [[bat]]-like creature. ==Pros== *Greatly increased movement speed (0.6 movement delay, i.e. [[spriggan]] speed) *Tiny [[size]] (good evasion and stealth) *+5 [[Dexterity]] *[[Fly]]ing *[[Vampire]]s retain a 1-in-8 chance of a [[vampiric]] melee attack ==Cons== *Spellcasting is disabled *All equipment other than [[amulet]]s is melded *[[Unarmed Combat]] base damage is 1 + UC *0 [[AC]] ==Sources== You can acquire this ability in the following ways: *[[Vampire]]s gain access to Bat Form at level 3 when Bloodless through their unique Bat Form ability. *[[Jiyva]] may induce Bat Form (along with a vicious dose of [[magic contamination]]) at random as divine punishment. *Being affected by a beam of [[polymorph]]. *Weapons of [[chaos]] may polymorph the attacker or the defender. *[[Cloud]]s of chaos. *Moon pies from a [[Killer Klown]]. ==Strategy== The most obvious use for Bat Form is for getting away from dangerous situations. Flying allows you to cross [[deep water]] or [[lava]], and the speed and evasion boosts make it easy to get away from melee opponents. Enemies with ranged attacks will still be a threat, particularly if they have unavoidable or [[smite]] attacks. Alternatively, it can be used to [[kite]] opponents if you happen to have the right abilities. Invokable and Evokable abilities still function while in Bat Form, allowing you to use [[wand]]s and god-given abilities ([[Makhleb]]'s abilities are particularly useful as they don't cost piety). The [[Good_mutations#Fangs|Fangs]] mutation also adds to your Unarmed Combat damage, but bats usually don't want to be in melee. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! Bat Form |- | [[File:Bat transform.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.25]], [[Transmutations]] [[miscast]]s could turn the player into a bat. *Prior to [[0.22]], Bat Form prevented the use of [[wand]]s. *Prior to [[0.20]], Bat Form's [[Unarmed Combat]] base damage was 1 + UC/5 for non-Vampires and 2 + UC for [[Vampires]]. It also came with a -40% lower attack delay. *Prior to [[0.19]], players could not quaff potions or open doors in Bat Form. Also, being in Bat Form reduced [[hunger]] rate to 1. *Prior to [[0.18]], Bat Form had a -5 Str penalty. Also, the effectiveness of [[Vampire]]'s vampiric bite was reduced while in Bat Form: they got 50% less hit points and nutrition from biting monsters with blood. *Prior to [[0.16]], drawing the [[Metamorphosis card]] could result in Bat Form. *Prior to [[0.15]], drawing the [[Flight card]] could result in Bat Form. *Before their removal, the Breathe Fire and Spit Poison mutations also functioned in Bat Form.
